Articles.Content:
Hello everyone and welcome to this year's newest and probably the best update in my opinion. We've finally gotten those mk0 fuel tanks!!! because mk1 is too big. Now it has finally allowed "us" to make even more smaller aircrafts. One being the me 262 which has tiny jet engines located on the wings. Anyway's enough talking lets jump straight into the pictures.

Very short video demonstrating the two bombs

So this plane does get two 500 Kg bombs and so I added them to lower end of the plane just like the real one!

It still is able to maintain that historical speed of even with less than 40 kiloNewtons of thrust! Dont be fooled though, this craft is reasonably light all though not looking like it...

And finally because Im not going to be that dropbox person.... anymore......

DOWNLOAD IT NOW ON KERBALX <----- Here <------- Here <------

I like it! Good work!

Only 2 views and Jon144 is already here Thanks

Who knows back into the tank business? I wonder if the tanks will survive the transfer....

Only 2 views and Jon144 is already here Thanks

Who knows back into the tank business? I wonder if the tanks will survive the transfer....

My tanks survived but my shuttle is broken for now. But look out. I have some of the fiercest tank concepts coming out in the future!
Great craft! I was thinking of makin a f-86 saber replica, and now with 1.0.5 might just be the time to do it

My tanks survived but my shuttle is broken for now. But look out. I have some of the fiercest tank concepts coming out in the future!

I don't plan on beating them since I mainly love doing replicas but I fear that If I was to make an MBT to counter yours, it'd be a battle of who made their "composite" layer cake, structural design hull armor of spam metal better.

Probably might release a cromwell tomorrow too. KSP has been revived again for me

I don't plan on beating them since I mainly love doing replicas but I fear that If I was to make an MBT to counter yours, it'd be a battle of who made their "composite" layer cake, structural design hull armor of spam metal better.

Probably might release a cromwell tomorrow too. KSP has been revived again for me

Please plan on beating them. Or at least competition. I currently have no stock tank rivals. Not even Zekes has anything released right now to compete with.
All ready got to work on an F-84b from War Thunder.
